business.headline: Swiggy share price falls 3% after listing. Should you buy or avoid?Swiggy share price: The drop comes after a decent debut, closing at Rs 455.95 the previous day, marking a 10.67% rise from its initial listing price.

Eicher Motors share price jumps over 8% after Q2 results. Should you buy?Eicher Motors share price: Royal Enfield's parent company posted an 8% year-on-year net profit increase to Rs 1,100 crore, up from Rs 1,016 crore a year earlier.
Niva Bupa share price: Stock lists at 6% premium on D-Street debutNiva Bupa shares listing: Shares of Niva Bupa listed at Rs 78.50 on the Bombay Stock Exchange at a premium of 6.08%.
Sensex, Nifty open marginally higher; Eicher Motors shares gain 7% The S&P BSE Sensex was up 62.80 points to 77,753.75, while NSE Nifty50 gained 6.60 points to 23,565.65.

Bitcoin breaches $93,000 mark amid Donald Trump's pro-crypto stanceBitcoin touched $93,400 at its peak, before settling around $90,000 as traders monitored its path toward the significant $100,000 level.

GIFT Nifty starts in red, down 10 points; market trading setup for todayThe stock market has been struggling due to sustained foreign fund outflows, weakening demand in certain sectors, and a fluctuating rupee.

Top stocks to watch today: Varun Beverages, Hero MotoCorp, Cipla, Grasim Stocks to watch: Several major stocks such as Grasim, Hero MotoCorp, and Honasa Consumer are likely to draw attention due to company updates and the release of quarterly results.

Major income tax reforms in pipeline, Budget 2025 to ease filing process: SourcesThe upcoming Union Budget 2025-26 is set to simplify India's Income Tax Act, by streamlining tax filing processes, reducing compliance burdens and expanding the tax base, Finance Ministry sources told India Today TV.
Inside Swiggy's listing gains: 70 dollar millionaires, 500 crorepati employees Swiggy market listing: As many as 70 current and former employees stand to become dollar millionaires.
'Trump time' for Bitcoin: How Donald Trump is sparking a crypto surgeSeveral industry experts believe Bitcoin's growth could accelerate under a more supportive US administration.

Sensex drops 1,000 points, Nifty slips below 23,600 amid stock market turmoilStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 984.23 points lower at 77,690.95 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 324.40 points to settle at 23,559.05.

Explained: Why Sensex nosedived 1,000 points todayStock market today: For now, analysts recommend cautious optimism as the Indian market grapples with global pressures and internal headwinds, while awaiting signs of stabilization in the months to come.

Suzlon shares fall over 9% today, 22% in 5 sessions. More downside ahead?Suzlon stock price: Suzlon Energy shares dropped 9.26% in Wednesday's trading session, hitting a low of Rs 53.89. The shares also dropped 22% in its previous 5 sessions.

Sensex slides 1,000 points: 4 factors behind stock market weaknessStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 969.44 points to 77,705.74 at 2:49 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 declined 319.25 points to trade at 23,564.20.

Swiggy CEO makes rare appearance at IPO listing, shares origin storySwiggy IPO Listing: Swiggy shares listed at a premium of 8% over issue price, beating GMP estimates on the National Stock Exchange (NSE).

Swiggy or Zomato: Which stock will deliver better returns to investors?Although Swiggy is trailing Zomato in profitability and scale, analysts believe its market position and diverse revenue streams offer potential for long-term growth.

Zinka Logistics Solution IPO opens for bidding: Should you subscribe? Zinka Logistics Solution Limited IPO comprises a fresh issue of 2.01 crore shares, raising Rs 550 crore, along with an offer for sale of 2.07 crore shares, amounting to Rs 564.72 crore.

Swiggy IPO listing delivers pleasant surprise to investors. Sell now or hold?Swiggy IPO Listing: With the company's shares opening at Rs 420 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), marking a solid 7.6% premium over its issue price of Rs 390, the performance has exceeded initial expectations

'You and I…': Zomato welcomes Swiggy on Dalal Street post stock market listingSwiggy market listing: Zomato's social media post, featuring a banner announcing Swiggy's listing, showcased a friendly nod between the two food tech giants.

Dalal Street debut goes dim for Acme Solar, lists at 13% discountAcme Solar shares listing: The stock debuted on the BSE Sensex at Rs 259 per share, marking a 10.3% drop from its issue price of Rs 289 per share.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Toxic smog chokes Delhi as air quality remains severe, over 200 flights delayedDelhi Air Pollution: The Air Quality Index worsened from 429 on Wednesday morning to 432 on Thursday morning. Several areas in the capital region recorded an AQI of over 450.

Violence as cops try to arrest Rajasthan politician for slapping poll officialNearly 24 large vehicles and 48 motorcycles were put on fire, with significant damage to several homes. In response, Special Task Force (STF) units were deployed early Thursday morning.

Busy making reels: Kanhaiya Kumar stokes row with remark on Fadnavis's wifeCampaigning in Nagpur, Congress's Kanhaiya Kumar, in a veiled dig at Devendra Fadnavis, said people need to put politicians in their place when they become arrogant.

Mumbai airport gets threat, caller says Azerbaijan-bound traveller carrying bombsMumbai Airport Bomb Threat: Mumbai airport gets bomb threat, caller says passenger travelling to Azerbaijan carrying explosives

Ugly, overweight: Old reply of Trump's Cabinet pick on abortion protesters viralMatt Gaetz, Trump's pick as the next attorney general, stoked a controversy in 2022 by calling abortion rights protesters ugly and overweight. An old video of Gaetz doubling down on his remarks has now gone viral.

IPL Auction prediction: Which players can KKR target with Rs 51 crore budget?IPL 2025 Auction: Kolkata Knight Riders, the defending champions, will look to restructure their squad in the upcoming auction and also look to find a new captain after Shreyas Iyer's departure.

Kanguva review: Great ideas but sub-par execution spoils Suriya's filmReleased-Thu Nov 14, 2024Kanguva movie review: Director Siruthai Siva's Kanguva, starring Suriya and Bobby Deol, has great potential. However, sub-par execution and incoherent writing bog down the film.

Melania Trump's 2nd stint as US First Lady unlikely to be full-time: ReportIt is more likely that Melania Trump will divide her time between Palm Beach and New York, where her son Barron Trump is attending New York University, visiting the White House primarily for ceremonial events such as state dinners or special occasions.

Europe's Proba-3 spacecraft fit to fly, ready to integrate with PSLVThe Proba-3 satellites arrived at the launch facility earlier this month and underwent rigorous functional testing to ensure they were unaffected by their journey from Europe.

Is pumped milk as nutritious as direct breastfeeding for your baby?While pumping is becoming increasingly popular among breastfeeding moms, many still hesitate to choose this method. Know from experts if pumped milk is just as good.

How Supreme Court guidelines put brakes on wheels of 'bulldozer justice'The court underlined that state-sanctioned bulldozer action against accused individuals—criticised as an instrument of intimidation—must adhere to due process and accountability

Should be as simple as...: Perplexity CEO to Elon Musk on immigration processPerplexity AI CEO Aravind Srinivas had earlier highlighted the challenges immigrants face while obtaining a green card in the US. He had also recounted his three-year wait for a green card.

Priyank Kharge slams Yogi Adityanath for raking up father's family tragedyPriyank Kharge on Yogi Adityanath: In a sharply worded rebuttal, Priyank Kharge said it was the Hyderabad Nizam's Razakars who burned down his father's house in 1948 and not the entire Muslim community.

Mirror mirror on the wall, how does Kareena manage to be the hottest of allKareena Kapoor Khan attended the flagship store launch of a brand she is the ambassador of. For the occasion, she dressed in a vintage Yves Saint Laurent 2002, by Tom Ford and looked absolutely stunning.

Shahid Afridi's Champions Trophy appeal: Owe it to cricket to keep egos in checkShahid Afridi has appealed to all the nations to come to Pakistan for the Champions Trophy 2025. His remarks come after the BCCI's reluctance to travel to Pakistan. He cited the example of the spirit of the Olympics and called for unity.

Salman Khan's team denies ties to The Great Indian Kapil Show amid legal troubleSalman Khan's team shared a statement and denied any involvement with The Great Indian Kapil Show on Netflix. This comes amid legal trouble against the show for presumably disrespecting Rabindranath Tagore's legacy.

BGT recap: When double centurion Gautam Gambhir faced one-match ban in 2008 BGT Recap: The 2008 Border-Gavaskar Trophy's third Test saw Gautam Gambhir score a career-best 206 and clash with Shane Watson, resulting in a controversial elbowing incident. The ICC penalized both players, handing Gambhir a one-match ban. Despite the drama, India retained their series lead, and Gambhir's innings became iconic.

Suryakumar Yadav confirms sacrificing No. 3 spot for Tilak Varma: He's earned itIndia T20I skipper Suryakumar Yadav confirmed Tilak Varma's place at number 3 after his match-winning century against South Africa, giving India a 2-1 series lead. Tilak's composed knock steadied the team, ensuring an 11-run victory.

Dependable Arshdeep Singh becomes India's most successful T20I fast bowlerSouth Africa vs India, 3rd T20I: Arshdeep Singh broke Bhuvneshwar Kumar's record to become the Indian pacer with the most wickets in T20 internationals. Arshdeep delivered with the new ball and at the death for India on Wednesday in Centurion.

Kusal Mendis, Avishka Fernando fire Sri Lanka to thumping win SL vs NZ: Kusal Mendis and Avishka Fernando scored twin hundreds, after which Dilshan Madushanka took three wickets as Sri Lanka beat New Zealand by 45 runs (DLS) in the first ODI on Wednesday.

Tilak Varma, Arshdeep Singh help India end Centurion trend, seal series lead South Africa (SA) vs IND (IND), 3rd T20I: India survived a scare from big-hitting Marco Jansen to become the first team in five years to defend a total at the SuperSport Park in Centurion successfully. Tilak Varma's maiden T20I hundred gave India a record total of 219 on Wednesday, November 13.

Varun Chakravarthy breaks Ashwin's record to make T20I history for IndiaSA vs IND: Varun Chakravarthy made history after breaking R Ashwin's record to become the Indian bowler with most wickets in a bilateral T20I series. He picked up the wickets of Aiden Markram and Reeza Hendricks.

Secret training in Perth? BCCI denies asking for closed-door practiceContrary to a media report in Australia, fans and media were allowed to watch India's training session at the iconic WACA in Perth on Wednesday, November 13. India will train at the WACA this week and at the Optus Stadium next week before the start of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

Flying ants halt T20I game in Centurion. Other bizarre stoppages in cricketSouth Africa vs India: Thousands of flying ants led to the stoppage of play during the 3rd T20I at the SuperSport Park in Centurion on Wednesday, November 13. Here are some other bizarre reasons for delays in play in cricket games.

Mumbai Indians star Tilak Varma becomes 2nd youngest Indian to hit T20I hundred South Africa vs India, 3rd T20I: Tilak Varma got to his maiden hundred in the shortest format in 51 balls on November 13. He became the second-youngest Indian to hit a century in T20Is.

Carlos Alcaraz overcomes illness to beat Rublev in ATP Finals 2024ATP Finals 2024: Carlos Alcaraz beat Andrey Rublev in straight sets in the group stage match on Wednesday. The Spaniard recovered after losing to Casper Ruud in the first match of the group stage.

U19 Asia Cup: 13-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi picked as BCCI announces India squadU19 Asia Cup 2024: India included 13-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi of Bihar in a strong 15-man squad. The 50-over tournament will be held in the UAE from November 30 to December 8.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
